channel.title: About on Daniel Butter
channel.description: Recent content in About on Daniel Butter

item.title: About
item.description: About me I am an American, a Yinzer, a Trekkie, a sci-fi aficionado, and a political junkie. I’ve lived in Cambridge, MA (undergrad), Berkeley, CA (grad school), Perth, Australia (postdoc 1), Amsterdam (postdoc 2), and College Station, Texas (postdoc 3). At some point, I picked up a wife and a daughter, and they’re both pretty swell. Research interests I am a theoretical physicist interested in the interplay between mathematical physics, supersymmetry, and string theory.

item.title: Contact
item.description: Personal Email: dbutter@gmail.com Work Email: dbutter@tamu.edu Physical Coordinates Mitchell Institute for Fundamental Physics & Astronomy, M509 Texas A&M University College Station, TX 77843 Mailing Address 1525 E 29th Street, Apt 605 Bryan, TX 77802

item.title: Publications
item.description: Here is a list of my publications and preprints. They can also be found either on inspire-HEP or on the arXiv. Note that in high energy physics, it is conventional to place authors in alphabetical order. Publications K. Becker and D. Butter, 4D $N=1$ Kaluza-Klein superspace, JHEP 09 (2020) 091. arXiv:2003.01790. K. Becker, M. Becker, D. Butter, W. D. Linch and S. Randall. Five-dimensional Supergravity in N = 1/2 Superspace, JHEP 03 (2020) 098.
